sentences.en: "Highly inflammable," it says on the spare canister.
sentences.cn: 备用罐上写着“高度易燃”。

sentences.en: A thing was inflammable if it contained phlogiston.
sentences.cn: 一样东西如果含有燃素,它就能燃烧.

sentences.en: Anti - static work clothing is the necessary protective clothing under the conditions of inflammable and explosive.
sentences.cn: 防 静电工作服是易燃易爆场所必穿的防护服装.

sentences.en: Clothes shouldn't be made of inflammable material.
sentences.cn: 衣服不应用易燃的衣料做.

sentences.en: Combustion hazard: This material is non inflammable, poisonous, and stimulated.
sentences.cn: 燃爆危险: 本品不燃, 有毒, 具强刺激性.

sentences.en: For your safety and security, please don't carry inflammable, explosive, fragile or heavy articles on board.
sentences.cn: 各位乘客:为了您和他人的乘车安全, 请不要携带易燃 、 爆 、 碎和笨重物品乘车.

sentences.en: Hazard properties: Non - inflammable, emits poisonous gas by high temperature.
sentences.cn: 危险特性: 本身不能燃烧.受高热分解放出有毒的气体.

sentences.en: Inflammable, explosive, corrosive, toxic and other dangerous goods classification must be securely and dedicated management.
sentences.cn: 易燃 、 易爆 、 腐蚀 、 有毒等危险物品必须分类妥善存放,并设专人管理.

sentences.en: Isolation strips should be cleared of all inflammable vegetation.
sentences.cn: 隔离带上所有易燃的植被应清除.

sentences.en: It is strictly forbidden to use cardboard, cloth, and so do shade of inflammable substances.
sentences.cn: 严禁用纸皮 、 布料等易燃物品做灯罩.

sentences.en: Most of them are inflammable, explosive and poisonous.
sentences.cn: 民用燃料的输送和储藏, 也涉及易燃易爆.

sentences.en: The low - boiling inflammable part and the high - boiling residue both had to be discarded as useless.
sentences.cn: 低沸点 易燃部分和高沸点之残渣油均须弃置用.

words.tran_cn: 炎症性的；煽动性的；激动的
[安全][物]易燃的；易怒的；易激动的

trans.tran_cn: 易燃的，<口>易激动的，易激怒的
trans.tran_en: inflammable materials or substances will start to burn very easily
